name: That Witch Stole My Cat!
description:
In this Halloween themed platformer, your cat gets stolen by a witch and taken far away. Traverse through different enemy infested landscapes in order to rescue your cat from that horrible witch!

Made as part of the Omaha Spoopy Jam 4.

Controls Keyboard Keyboard WASD XBOX (gamepad) Move: Arrowkeys WASD Dpad, Left Stick Jump: Z, Spacebar J, Spacebar A Credits

Programming/Backgrounds/Storyboard Art by theJAMARK1

Game Art/Music/SFX by Emmy Miller
